definition.0: Python is a general-purpose programming language.
definition.1: Structured Query Language (SQL) is commonly used for managing relational databases.
definition.2: A Comma-Separated Values (CSV) file is a text file in which each line represents a record, and each field within that record is separated by a comma.
definition.3: To secure the solution and data is only available to those who have appropriate access.
definition.4: The solution performs quickly enough to meet the business demand.
definition.5: Magic or Dunder Methods are special methods in Python that start and end with double underscores (__). They are used for operator overloading, customization of object behavior, and more.
